Reviews.Title: “Very Quaint Hotel in Good Location”

Reviews.Content: quaint hotel street piazza farnese 2 3 minute walk campo dei fiori plaza restaurants lots activity breakfast buffet fresh fruits tomatoes meats morning buffet spacious quaint biggest disappointment uncertainty internet terminal internet negative review access internet definitely stay due location
